title: New Type Family "Haptic"
content:
**Haptic** is out now.

[http://www.dehac.de/seiten/haptic/haptic.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20150322032641/http:/www.dehac.de/seiten/haptic/haptic.html), or  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/henning-skibbe/haptic/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150322032641/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/henning-skibbe/haptic/)

Specimen here:  
 [http://www.dehac.de/haptic\_specimen.pdf](http://web.archive.org/web/20150322032641/http:/www.dehac.de/haptic_specimen.pdf)

I hope you like it.
author: dehac

comments.content: Nicely done. It looks like a very usable and useful addition to the growing number of humanist rounded sans.
